entry.title: A BHOY CALLED JOE: Part Two
entry.summary: JOE McBRIDE was Jock Stein’s first signing for Celtic at £22,000 from Motherwell in the summer of 1965. The powerhouse and prolific hitman walloped in 86 goals in 94 appearances for his boyhood idols in his three years at Parkhead. An astonishing 54 of the strikes came in only 55 league games.
